mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(book_id) FROM borrow WHERE user_id=#{id} AND (status =1 OR status=0)
SELECT COUNT(comment) FROM borrow WHERE user_id=#{id} AND comment!=NULL
SELECT id FROM user WHERE account=#{account}
SELECT user_id FROM reserve WHERE book_id=#{book_id} ORDER BY reserveDate DESC limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO borrow (book_id, user_id, borrowDate, returnDate, status) VALUES (#{book_id},#{reserve_id},now(),date_add(NOW(), interval 1 MONTH),#{status})
INSERT INTO reserve (book_id, user_id, reserveDate, give_me) VALUES (#{book_id},#{reserve_id},now(),FALSE )
